text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump It's widely believed that the novel coronavirus was created in and leaked out from the United States Army Medical Research Institute of Infectious Diseases, in Fort Detrick, Md！The US should take the blame and pay for the losses of the whole world！!!God bless people of  the US.
